dc:title: California C. W. Groups Starting Right
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Tells of the Catholic Worker houses and projects in Los Angelus and San Francisco. Notes the many priests and bishops involved with labor issues and the need for a philosophy of work.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 327 1937-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
